reference.title: javaException
reference.shortdesc: The <javaException> element provides the declaration for the exceptions thrown by the execution of the method.

section.title: Description
section.p:
A method declares executable code that can be invoked by passing a fixed number of values as arguments:
MethodDeclaration: MethodModifiersopt ResultType MethodDeclarator Throwsopt ClassBody Throws: throws ClassType, ClassTypeList
